content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, I find the proposed apartment highly sought after due to its prime city center location and modern features. However, to ensure I secure the most advantageous rental agreement, let me counter your initial offer with a slightly higher price. TERMINATE (Assuming a negotiation continues with numerical prices exchanged, the character will attempt to maximize the rental amount.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
